verses.name: Genesis 13:15
verses.text: For all the land which thou seest, to thee will I give it, and to thy seed for ever.

verses.name: Genesis 13:16
verses.text: And I will make thy seed as the dust of the earth: so that if a man can number the dust of the earth, then shall thy seed also be numbered.

verses.name: Genesis 13:17
verses.text: Arise, walk through the land in the length of it and in the breadth of it; for I will give it unto thee.

verses.name: Genesis 13:18
verses.text: Then Abram removed his tent, and came and dwelt in the plain of Mamre, which is in Hebron, and built there an altar unto the Lord.
